title: Goblin Mechanist
desc:
Post 2003
*Half the time: brilliant. Half the time: on fire. Half the time: both.*
- While this is in your ID zone, a **Phantom** copy of each <:trinket:1141745128898310144> held by another player gets sent to your hand if you do no already own one.
- Each turn, one of these two outcomes is chosen with 50/50 odds:
 - You explode and draw 3 <:inferno:1118594776716021780> cards.
 - You gain a random new **Phantom** <:trinket:1141745128898310144> card.
- At any time, you may spend a turn to discard this from your Identity Zone, but if you do, you lose all **Phantom** <:trinket:1141745128898310144> cards in your hand.
